name: Pizza Hut Demo CD
overview: The Pizza Hut demo disc contains a release of the MediEvil demo. 3.5 million copies of the disc were given out by Pizza Hut to consumers who bought a Stuffed Crust Pizza starting November 22, 1998. Other games include Gran Turismo, Metal Gear Solid, Crash Bandicoot: WARPED, and Tomb Raider III.
